#include <cstdlib>
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cmath>


using namespace std;

int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    int T;
    int N;
    cin>>T;
    for(int i=0; i<T; i++){
            vector<int> tabx;
            vector<int> taby;
            cin>>N;
            int temp;
            double sum=0;
            for(int j=0; j<N; j=j+1){
                    int temp;
                    cin>>temp;
                    tabx.push_back(temp);
            }
            tabx.push_back(tabx.front());
            for(int j=0; j<N; j=j+1){
                    int temp;
                    cin>>temp;
                    taby.push_back(temp);
            }
            taby.push_back(taby.front());
            for(int j=0; j<N; j=j+1){
                    sum +=(tabx[j]-tabx[j+1])*(taby[j]+taby[j+1])/2.0;
            }
            cout<<fixed<<setprecision(1)<<fabs(sum)<<'\n';
    }
    
    return EXIT_SUCCESS;
}
